    • Constructor Detail

      • Home

        public Home()

    • Method Detail

      • index

        public static void index()
        Renders the Home.index view for the logged in user, otherwise redirects to the Accounts.index view if user cannot be identified.

      • drop

        public static void drop(java.lang.Long id)
        Drop a friend from the users list of friendships. Renders the Home.index view.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the friend to drop

      • byUser

        public static void byUser()
        Sorts the message view in Home by user that sent the message. Renders sorted Home.byUser view (or Accounts.index if user can't be found).

      • byDate

        public static void byDate()
        Sorts the message view in Home by the date that the message was sent. Renders sortedHome.byDate view(or Accounts.index if user can't be found).

      • byConv

        public static void byConv()
        Sorts the message view in Home by individual conversation with each user. Renders sorted Home.byConv view (or Accounts.index if user can't be found).

      • getConv

        private static java.util.ArrayList<Message> getConv(User user,
                                   User friend)
        Helper method that retrieves all messages between two users, returning them in an arraylist of that conversation. Returned arraylist is sorted by date.
        Parameters:
        user - first user in conversation
        friend - second user in conversation
        Returns:
        an arralist of all messages between the specified users
